title: Ask A Trainer: Are your electrical outlets dangerous?
body: Electrical issues are one of the most common causes of household fires. With the potential overload from all the appliances to normal wear and tear, your electrical outlets can put you at risk just as much as they benefit your lifestyle.For example, when an electrical outlet feels warm to the touch, there is often an issue happening behind the scenes. Although in most cases it isn't an immediate danger, all electrical problems left unaddressed can become serious fire hazards.When it comes to creating a safe home environment, an electrical system that is in proper working order should be at the top of your priority list.
